body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Governors Island with Manhattan in the center background and Brooklyn on the right Copyrighted by Andrew Moore  Governors Island 2016 public season will begin May 28, 2016.   Basic Information - for hours & seasons, fees, eating, bicycling, pets, and rules   Directions - for general ferry information and directions to the ferries, see also Governors Island ferry schedules and fares   National Park Service regular programming schedule and calendar of events   Trust for Governors Island links to exhibitions, events, and biking, food, and other activities        Basic Information Directions & Transportation Things To Do Calendar Safety Accessibility              Información en español (Information in Spanish)
title: Governors Island National Monument: Plan Your Visit
